metadata.synopsis: A mother that recently lost his child and has come to the graveyard with her husband to get a specially made coffin. Very dark, but gives the player a tiny sidequest they can complete to feel good about themselves (perhaps?)

0.speaker: Anita Fischer
0.text: I can finally mourn for my little girl in peace. Thank you.
0.context: NodeContext: little upset, but mainly grateful

1.speaker: Anita Fischer
1.text: Don't bother speaking to the gravekeeper - she won't do anything about her precious carpenter.

2.speaker: Anita Fischer
2.text: Lily was the best kid you could have asked for. I wish you could have seen her smile...
2.context: NodeContext: little upset, but mainly grateful

3.speaker: Anita Fischer
3.text: If you're here for a coffin, get ready to wait.
